pageContent.descriptionText:
You are on the right track. The first question you ask Dr. Hayes should be one that opens the conversation regarding practice knowledge and patient outcomes that the practice is trying to achieve. This Results question begins to create a foundation for aligning the product with the practice’s patient outcomes, which is the best beginning point for becoming a trusted advisor.
Whenever you begin the prescribing process with a consideration of the practice’s patient goals, it enhances your ability to advance the prescribing cycle.
